description:
GNU Midnight Commander is a visual file manager, licensed under GNU General Public License and therefore qualifies as Free Software.

GNU Midnight Commander is a visual file manager, licensed under GNU General Public License and therefore qualifies as Free Software.
It's a feature rich full-screen text mode application that allows you to copy, move and delete files and whole directory trees, search for files and run commands in the subshell.
Internal viewer and editor are included.
upgrades/bug-fixes
- X86 intrinsic atomic function usage replaced, arm64 issues (#157)
- Windows XP compatibility (#156)
- libappupdater upgrade (chang-cl support)
- libw32: additional compliance changes
